line_1: In the bloom of her graces, too fair for a nun!
line_2: In the bloom of her youth to a cloister she run;

line_1: To-day more holy than a cloister'd Nun,
line_2: Almost an Atheist by to-morrow's Sun:

line_1: But Mrs. Oldfield is become a nun.
line_2: P.S. Lucrece for half a crown will show you fun,
